```{=html}
<style>
    iframe {
        aspect-ratio: 16 / 9;
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%;
    }
</style>
```

```{python}
# | include: false
def example(file):
    file_html = file.replace(".qmd", ".html")
    with open(file) as f:
        code = f.read()

    print("<details class='code-fold'>")
    print("````qmd")
    print(code)
    print("````")
    print("</details>")
    print(f'<iframe class="slide-deck" src="{file_html}"></iframe>')
```

# Examples

## PNG

```{python}
# | echo: false
# | output: asis
example("examples/animated_figure.qmd")
```

## SVG

```{python}
# | echo: false
